@JohnJHarwood I haven’t stood for the anthem since Thanksgiving 2016. (I don’t kneel because my knees might not let me back up). I despise jingoistic fascism. I believe #BlackLivesMatter. I stopped watching football last year due to blackballing of @Kaepernick7. Won’t watch this year either.

It’s #HamilHangover day after thrilling opening of @HamiltonMusical @dpac. Philip Co is 🔥, energy, passion. I get tipsy knowing our @TheHamilcast “friends” are in my neighborhood this month. Thanks @NikkyWalks @fergsters95 @shoba_narayan @MissTarea @elimusic01 and all. #DurHAM https://t.co/94qtsJFE0k

@Stonekettle I’m celebrating in heavily gerrymandered NC. The GOP supermajority is gone, so the arrogant ramming through of veto-proof bills will be over in January. Power-grabbing Constitutional amendments also defeated. Dems take firm hold of state Supreme Court. More than baby steps.

I saw @HamiltonMusical tonight @DPAC and it was thrilling. But this might be the most thrilling thing I’ve heard all day! Thank you, Senator @JeffJacksonNC for your work to restore a democratic government to NC. #VotingMatters https://t.co/pwqBzPvxkK

@NikkyWalks I’ve marched and donated, I’ve fretted and sweated and cajoled. I’ve voted. Tonight I’m heeding this advice: spending the evening with some people who brighten every day for me - the cast of the Philip tour of @HamiltonMusical. Midnight is soon enough to know the rest. #RiseUp
